Title: Authorizes school district property to be used for not-for-profit dental clinics providing care to families in the district
Summary: Authorizes school district property to be used for not-for-profit dental clinics providing care to families in the district upon the approval of the trustees or board of education of a school district.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing the use of schoolhouses and grounds by not-for-profit dental clinics
